properties.markdownProperty:
Application archetypes are stored inside each profile. It has a defined directory structure in order to be loaded. They are found in the profile root directory in a folder called *archetypes* (this can be changed in the profile configuration file). Inside the archetype directory there are multiple folders:
- *projects*, contains a folder for each project archetype. Project archetypes are projects but the project file *proteus.xml* is named *project.xml*. - *documents*, contains a folder for each document archetype. - *objects*, contains a folder for each 'group' of archetype objects. Object archetypes are grouped so they can be displayed in different tabs in the menu (archetypes related to figures, software, general, etc).
